version_description: Fixed critical bug causing a progress block for some users at level 28.

- NEW LEVELS! Season 6 Released! 
- Improved Appeal Mechanic

- Fixed bug where ball occasionally was not collected by fielders
- Fixed bug where completing an objective on the last bowl did not count as success
- Fixed miscellaneous text bugs

- Fix for critical bug causing issues with save data.  

If your progress has been affected by this bug, please contact support@distinctivegames.com and include your User ID (located in Cricket Megastar, on the settings menu).

New Seasons 7 and 8! 
- Your Megastar is called up to International Test, One Day and T20 Matches!
- Will your Megastar move to a new Domestic team or stay loyal to where he is? 

New Limited Availablity Bats!
- Keep your eyes open for your chance to get the extra powerful and super long lasting Limited Time Offer Bats! 

Bug fixes and Balance Changes 
- Fixed some impossible objectives 
- Fixed some missing text strings 
- Increased number of Games for most Bats
Replaced white ball with red ball so that it can be seen more easily.

Improved support for iPhone X.
Miscellaneous bug fixes.
Added Seasons 9 and 10! Game now has 140 levels, with more still to come.

New T20 Cricket Premier League Live Events!  

Compete against other Cricket fans worldwide to help your team win the T20 Cricket Premier League!
Show off your Cricket skills by becoming the top Batsman for your team!

Bug Fixes

Fixed a bug where scoring 0 runs on the last bowl of an over would not cause Batsmen to switch.

2 NEW SEASONS - It's International Tour time again, can the Megastar make it to International Captain?

Implemented T20 and ODI fielding rules and pitch lines.
Improvements to user experience with Advertising.

Take part in the World Cup in seasons 15 and 16! 

Can you and your team win the trophy and International glory?
General improvements and privacy policy update.

Take part in the World Cup in seasons 15 and 16! 

Can you and your team win the trophy and International glory?
Fix for progress block on level 98.
Balance adjustments and improvements to user experience.

Fix for various bugs.

Fix for impossible level objective.
